otpl.lxp.traceability-report.name: Links Explorer - Traceability Reports
otpl.lxp.traceability-report.label: Links Explorer - Traceability Reports
otpl.lxp.traceability-report.description: End to end traceability reports displaying Jira issues and their linked issues in an easy to comprehend tabular format.
otpl.lxp.traceability-report.issuetype-v: View related issues by their types
otpl.lxp.traceability-report.linktype-vi: View related issues by their link types
otpl.lxp.traceability-report.tree-view.d: View related issues in tree hierarchy format
otpl.lxp.traceability-report.toolbar.jql: Use a new JQL query to search issues
otpl.lxp.traceability-report.toolbar.set: If this option is enabled then all the linked issue cards will be displayed otherwise at max 3 linked issue cards will be displayed with an option to load more in a table cell.

This option enables automatic hiding of columns that do not contain any information related to the linked issues. However, if a column is manually disabled through the 'Table Fields' dropdown, then it will not be displayed regardless of this option's value.
otpl.lxp.traceability-report.select-filt: Please select filter to view report
